description: Support to the Establishment and Institutional Strengthening of the National Regulatory Authority (NRA) for the UXO/Mine Action Sector in the Lao PDR

subproject.corporate outcome: Negative impacts of UXO on food security and livelihood of the people in the affected communities reduced
subproject.description: The output is linked to the Safe Path Forward II (UXO sector strategy) sub-objectives 4 and 5. The output of the project is capacity development of the NRA management including the NRA's capacity on its mandate of coordination and regulation in the UXO sector.
subproject.title: NRA - UXO Coordination

subproject.corporate outcome: Negative impacts of UXO on food security and livelihood of the people in the affected communities reduced
subproject.description: The output is linked to the Safe Path Forward II (UXO sector strategy) sub-objectives 4 and 5. The output of the project is capacity development of the NRA management including the NRA's capacity on its mandate of coordination and regulation in the UXO sector.
subproject.title: NRA - UXO Coordination

subproject.corporate outcome: Negative impacts of UXO on food security and livelihood of the people in the affected communities reduced
subproject.description: The project is linked to the Safe Path Forward II (UXO sector strategy) sub-project 6.  The output expected from the project is delivery of the CCM obligations within the NRA mandate such as coordination for the national implementation of the CCM (article 9), transparency report (article 7), and facilitation of the international cooperation and assistance (article 6).
donor_long: DEPT OF FOR AFF & INTL TRADE GOV CANADA
subproject.title: NRA - UXO CCM

subproject.corporate outcome: Negative impacts of UXO on food security and livelihood of the people in the affected communities reduced

subproject.corporate outcome: Negative impacts of UXO on food security and livelihood of the people in the affected communities reduced
subproject.description: This project is linked to the Safe Path Forward II (UXO sector strategy) sub-project 1.  The output is development of targeted and effective MRE approaches focusing on behavour change.
subproject.title: Better MRE approach

subproject.corporate outcome: Negative impacts of UXO on food security and livelihood of the people in the affected communities reduced
subproject.description: The project is related to the Safe Path Forward II (UXO Sector Strategy) sub-project 2.  The output is improved understanding of the survivors' needs and information management through IMSMA (Information Management System for Mine Action), UXO survivor tracking system, and VA (victim assistance) strategy.
subproject.title: NRA - Victim Assistance

subproject.corporate outcome: Negative impacts of UXO on food security and livelihood of the people in the affected communities reduced
subproject.description: The project is related to the Safe Path Forward II (UXO sector strategy in Lao PDR) sub-objective 3.  The output is developing approaches for setting prioritization for UXO clearance, to release priority land for agriculture and development.
subproject.title: NRA - Clearance Prioritization

title: Support to National Regulatory Authority for UXO in Laos
